articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Surface-to -Surface Medium Long-range Ballistic Missile
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Surface-to -surface Medium Long-range Ballistic Missile
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A surface-to-surface medium long-range ballistic missile Pukguksong-2, Korean style new type strategic weapon system, was successfully test-fired on Sunday.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, guided the test-fire of Pukguksong-2 on the spot.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un set forth the task of developing the weapon system into surface-to-surface ballistic missile with extended firing range on the basis of the success made in the SLBM underwater test-fire held in August last year.
					
					 He received the report on the development of Pukguksong-2, set the date of the test-fire of the missile and personally guided the preparations for it on the spot.
					
					 Before the test-fire that day he looked round the caterpillar self-propelled missile launching truck produced by workers in the munitions industry by their own efforts, technology and wisdom.
					
					 At the observation post he learned in detail about the plan for the test-fire of Pukguksong-2 and gave the order to launch it.
					
					 The test-fire proved the reliability and security of the surface launch system and starting feature of the high thrust solid fuel-powered engine and reconfirmed the guidance and control features of ballistic missile during its active flight and working feature of high thrust solid fuel- powered engines and those of separation at the stages.
					
					 It also verified the position control and guidance in the middle section and section of re-entry after the separation of the improved warhead of the missile which can be tipped with a nuclear warhead, the feature of evading interception, etc. The test-fire helped test and round off the mobility and operation of the new type missile launching truck in the worst surface condition and finally confirm its technological specifications through ballistic missile launch.
					
					 The test-fire was conducted by the high-angle launching method instead of firing range, taking the security of the neighboring countries into consideration.
					
					 He said that the newly developed Pukguksong-2 is the Korean style  advantageous weapon system providing convenience in operation and ensuring speed in striking and a Juche-missile, Juche-weapon in name and reality as the launching truck and ballistic missile were designed and manufactured and fired by the indigenous wisdom, efforts and technology 100 percent. He expressed great satisfaction over the possession of another powerful nuclear attack means which adds to the tremendous might of the country.
					
					 Now our rocket industry has radically turned into high thrust solid fuel-powered engine from liquid fuel rocket engine and rapidly developed into a development- and creation-oriented industry, not just copying samples, he said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the development of the new strategic weapon system, our People's Army is capable of performing its strategic duties most accurately and rapidly in any space: under waters or on the land. 
					
					 At the end of the test-fire he had a photo taken with scientists and technicians in the field of defence industry and service personnel who took part in the test-fire of Pukguksong-2.

articles.title: Planned S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drill Slammed
articles.content:
Planned S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drill Slammed
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Nationwide Emergency Measure Committee against DPRK-targeted Nuclear War Exercises issued a statement Monday as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet forces are going busy to stage the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises together with the U.S. in upcoming March.
					 The statement says:
					
					 The said drill which will involve huge aggression forces, including all nuclear strike means of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, will take place under the plan for a preemptive strike at the DPRK, including 4D operation scenario envisaging the "detection" of its nuclear and missile bases, "defence" from them, "disturbance and destruction" of them and "beheading operation." This is an open disclosure of the attempt to launch a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces' racket for a war against the DPRK and the hostile policy of the U.S. which actively supports it are an intolerable challenge to the Korean nation's desire and aspiration after peace and reunification. And they constitute an open violation of the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Hostility, discord, distrust and confrontation have now gone beyond such tolerance limit that any slightest and accidental conflict may lead to an unpredicted incident on the Korean peninsula. This is the situation prevailing on the peninsula at present.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will take appropriate countermeasures depending on the level of the nuclear war racket being planned and pressed for by the south Korean puppet forces with the U.S. involved.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs had better stop their rash actions, pondering over what counter-actions will be entailed by their reckless and serious nuclear war racket against the DPRK.

articles.title: Official of OC Denounces Sanctions Slapped by U.S. and Hostile Forces against Sports Field of DPRK
articles.content:
Official of OC Denounces Sanctions Slapped by U.S. and Hostile Forces against Sports Field of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Kang Ryong Gil, deputy secretary general of the DPRK Olympic Committee (OC), was interviewed by reporters of the Pyongyang bureaus of the AFP and the APTN and KCNA on Monday as regards the sanctions on the sports field of the DPRK.
					 Kang said:
					
					 Sports is of great significance in improving physical and spiritual strength of the human being and promoting the understanding, friendship and collaboration between peoples. For this reason, all countries, nations and peoples on the earth regard sports as noble and sacred one and show their constant interests in and exert all efforts to the development of sports.
					
					 It is the policy of the government of DPRK and the aspiration of our people to build a sports power and a civilized power by improving physical fitness of the people and developing sports of the country.
					
					 However, to our regret, hostile acts are being conducted blatantly on global scale to put the brake on the policy of the DPRK government and hinder the aspiration of the people to develop its sports.
					
					 The United States and hostile forces have fabricated six illegal "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK at the UN Security Council since 2006 with the aim to isolate and stifle the DPRK over nuclear issue and they railroaded the "Resolution" 2270 even including the recreational sports equipment in the sanctions items while adding the luxury goods in March 2016.
					
					 And certain countries, under the undisguised name of implementing the "sanctions resolution", made public decisions and follow-up regulations defining the items of embargo to the DPRK and imposed to forbid export to it such equipment as ski, yacht, mountaineering boots, snow motor, snow groomer, etc. and even billiard table and other recreation materials.
					
					 On the other hand, the U.S. and the hostile forces are creating obstacle blocking the bank transfer to prevent the fund assistance which the IOC and sports federations provide for development of the Olympic movement and sports in member countries.
					
					 Here lies the vicious ulterior political scheme to prevent exchange of sports between the DPRK and other countries, gradually limit its participation in international competitions including the Olympics, push it aside out of the modern civilized world and further seek a regime change.
					
					 We strongly condemn this as despicable, illegal and immoral act completely contradicting to the ideal of the Olympics to build better and peaceful world through sports that promote physical and spiritual development of the human beings and to the UN Charter which stipulates the provision of the rights to sovereignty, equality and development of independent state.
					
					 A few European countries and their sports ware businesses are blindly dragged into the wicked attempts of politicizing sports and refrain from providing us with sports equipment including ski, yacht, sports firearms or ammunitions, archeries, only to make their fame damaged for themselves.
					
					 The thing is that sports firearms can never be turned into rockets nor the rockets be fired from them.
					
					 The world, through the abnormal situation taking place before our eyes, should squarely see that sanctions are nothing but a cruel and uncivilized act against humanity and civilization and an act of destroying the modern civilization as well as making the whole world turn back to the medieval dark land.
					
					 No argument can justify the brigandish logic that the country being regarded as hostile by the U.S. should abandon its right to sports development and the history of international sports will surely count it to do a sum.

articles.title: People Meet at Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Secret Camp in Mt Paektu
articles.content:
People Meet at Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Secret Camp in Mt Paektu
 Samjiyon, February 13 (KCNA) -- A large crowd of people met at leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp to vow to hold him in high esteem for all ages and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche to the last under the leadership of the Party.
					 Attending it were Korean People's Army Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affaires Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; Vice-Chairman of the C.C., WPK O Su Yong, Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il and Vice-Premier of the Cabinet and Chairman of the State Planning Commission Ro Tu Chol, who are members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK; officials of party and armed forces organs, and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the KPA, officers and shock brigade members of the 216 Division and officials and persons of distinguished services in Ryanggang Province and Samjiyon County.
					
					 Speeches were made by O Su Yong and Hwang Pyong So and Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats before the country and the history by leading the WPK and the revolution to the ever-victorious road for half a century.
					
					 No matter the world may change more than a hundred times and what storm and stress they may face, they would absolutely trust respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, decisively defend him politically and ideologically and at the risk of their lives and establish the unified leadership system of the supreme leader more firmly in the whole Party and society, they noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean revolutionary armed forces will hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Songun of Juche and glorify the army building feats associated with his whole life generation after generation no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 They solemnly vowed to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and endlessly glorify the idea of youth movement of Kim Jong Il who brought up young people to be reliable political reserves of the Party and the detached force of the supreme commander, and his leadership feats.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed in the sky above the sacred land of the revolution.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid at Statue of Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid at Statue of Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County
 Samjiyon, February 13 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statue of leader Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County of Ryanggang Province on Monday on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Present at the floral basket-laying ceremony were Korean People's Army Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affaires Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; Vice-Chairman of the C.C., WPK O Su Yong, Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il and Vice-Premier of the Cabinet and Chairman of the State Planning Commission Ro Tu Chol, who are members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK; officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army, service personnel of the KPA, commanding officers and members of the 216 Division and officials and inhabitants in Ryanggang Province and Samjiyon County.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA, was laid before the statue of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A floral basket in the joint name of the C.C., WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and a floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK were laid there.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of KPA units, 216 Division, party and power bodies and industrial establishments in Ryanggang Province and Samjiyon County, etc. were laid before the statue.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statue of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Art Performance Given in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in Samjiyon County
 Samjiyon, February 13 (KCNA) -- A performance by members of the Samjiyon county art group was given at the Samjiyon County House of Culture Monday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Enjoying it were Korean People's Army Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affaires Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; Vice-Chairman of the C.C., WPK O Su Yong, Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il and Vice-Premier of the Cabinet and Chairman of the State Planning Commission Ro Tu Chol, who are members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK; and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army, officers and members of the 216 Division and officials and inhabitants in Ryanggang Province and Samjiyon County.
					
					 The performance began with poem and chorus "Greeting Spring on Jong Il Peak," "Shine, Jong Il Peak" and "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas." Colorful numbers were put on the stage.
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the feats of Kim Jong Il who provided eternal foundations for the accomplishment of the Juche revolution and the country's prosperity, holding the banner of Songun. 
					
					 In narration and song "We Call You Father" they sang pride of holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as father of the great family of the country.

articles.title: Performance of Art Groups of Commissions, Ministries and National Institutions Given
articles.content:
Performance of Art Groups of Commissions, Ministries and National Institutions Given
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Art groups of commissions, ministries and national institutions gave performances at the People's Palace of Culture and the Central Hall of Workers on Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were given by civil servants of more than 30 units such as the State Academy of Sciences, the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and the External Construction Guidance Bureau.
					
					 Put on the stages were chorus "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun", mixed chorus "Boundless Is Our Yearning", etc.
					
					 The performers praised Kim Jong Il for defending the destiny of the country and nation and ushering in the great new era of building a powerful socialist country on this land under the banner of Songun.
					
					 They also sang high praises of the pride and joy of the people demonstrating the might of socialism under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully realizing the lifelong desire of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performances were enjoyed by Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Pyong Hae, Im Chol Ung and Jo Yon Jun and officials of working people's organizations, commissions, ministries and national institutions.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Staff Members of Foreign Diplomatic Missions Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Staff Members of Foreign Diplomatic Missions Held
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The International Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a friendly meeting with staff members of foreign diplomatic missions here on Monday on the occasion of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Present there on invitation were staff members of foreign diplomatic missions here.
					
					 Present there were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK who doubles as vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and other officials of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean documentary film "The Great Comrade Kim Jong Il Is the Elder of World Politics".
					
					 A reception was given for the staff members of foreign diplomatic missions.

articles.title: Performance of Art Squad of Youth League
articles.content:
Performance of Art Squad of Youth League
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League gave a performance at the Central Youth Hall on Monday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Its numbers included mixed chorus "Golden Cushion" and song and dance and national instrumental ensemble "Song of Big Fish Haul".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il who had worked the immortal feats for the country and the people and on behalf of the times and history.
					
					 Female quintet "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" impressively represented the traits of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a great man and mixed sextet and chorus "Song of Youth" showed the stamina of youth vanguard in the era of Songun opening the road of advance to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and relevant field and youth and students.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Iranian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with Seyed Mohsen Emadi, new Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: DPRK-Cuba Inter-governmental Protocols Signed
articles.content:
DPRK-Cuba Inter-governmental Protocols Signed
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK-Cuba inter-governmental protocols on the meeting for economic, scientific and technological cooperation and development in 2017 and on commodity exchange in 2017 were signed in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony were Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, and officials concerned from the DPRK side and Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy from the Cuban side.
					
					 The protocols were inked by Kim Yong Jae and Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo.

articles.title: Int'l Diploma Awarded to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Int'l Diploma Awarded to Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru awarded international diplomas to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 An event was held in Lima on Feb. 6 to convey the diplomas.
					
					 Present there were General Secretary Victor Oliva Miguel and other leadership members of the Party and its members and the DPRK ambassador to Peru and his embassy officials.
					
					 The general secretary conveyed the diplomas to the DPRK ambassador.
					
					 The diploma reads that the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru has pleasure to confer international diplomas on the great persons of Mt Paektu for their undying feats for the strengthening of the Party and the victory of the socialist cause in the DPRK and for the human cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, handed them over to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho on behalf of the corps on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A staff member of the Palestinian embassy here handed the floral basket over to an official concerned on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to mark the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral basket was laid at the statues on Monday.

articles.title: Chinese and China-Resident Koreans Here
articles.content:
Chinese and China-Resident Koreans Here
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Chinese and China-resident Koreans came here Monday to take part in the 21st Kimjongilia Festival.
					 Among them are Cui Yingjun, general manager of Dandong Xianrong Trading Co. Ltd., China, and Choe Ryong Ho, former vice-president of the Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China.
					
					 Earlier, arriving were Pang Rui, general manager of Dusen Economic Trading Co. Ltd. in Jilin City of China, Li Yonghao, general manager of the Dandong Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., of China, and his party and other guests.

articles.title: Construction of Railroad Bed and Tunnels Completed in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Construction of Railroad Bed and Tunnels Completed in Samjiyon County
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The construction of Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway progresses apace in Ryanggang Province, the DPRK.
					 The Hyesan-Samjiyon Railway Construction Brigade under the 216 Division finished laying railroad bed and building tunnels and other structures in a little more than a year. 
					
					 The brigade conducted a number of blasting, including a blasting of 130 000 cubic meter earth, and continued the construction even in winter.
					
					 Now, the brigade is building the Wiyon Youth Station, while planting trees in its surroundings.

articles.title: Big Efforts Directed to Fish Farming in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Big Efforts Directed to Fish Farming in Pyongyang 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that the fishing sector should conduct a dynamic drive for catching fishes and push perseveringly ahead with aquatic farming.   
					 True to his intention, the Pyongyang City Fish Farming Management Bureau set stepwise goals for developing fish culture and is concentrating efforts on achieving them.
					
					 Now the Bureau has pushed forward such projects as completing recipes of assorted foods for different fishes, making mullet get adapted to freshwater and solving sci-tech problems arising in cage-net fish farming and loach farming.
					
					 It has applied automatic feeders to seed-fish breeding units and hastened the work to establish integrated production system at the units.
					
					 It also increases fish production in existing cage-nets and is building a large-capacity assorted food production base and an in-door fish farm.
					
					 Meanwhile, its affiliated units have kept fish ponds and waterways in good repair and strived to set up a ring-shaped rotation production system of livestock and fish farming.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Will Be Lauded Forever: Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Will Be Lauded Forever: Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The undying feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il to provide solid foundations for the strengthening of the DPRK, the prosperity of the nation and the reunification of the country will be praised for all ages.
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, said this when interviewed by KCNA Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There are not a few famous statesmen and great persons in the human history of politics, but no such peerless saint can be found as Kim Jong Il who had performed immortal feats on behalf of the times and history, the chief said, adding:
					
					 His whole life was the most brilliant life of a great patriot who covered the untrodden and unexplored path with his iron will and superhuman efforts for the country and the nation.
					
					 He honorably defended the nation's sovereignty and dignity with his original Songun politics and made the DPRK tower in the world as politico-ideological and world-level military power and thus turned it into a land of bliss for the people startling the world.
					
					 He, who took to heart more than anyone else the misfortune and pains of national division, ushered in the June 15 era of emotion and joy on the land of Korea, which remained frozen due to confrontation and distrust, with his fixed will for reunification and courageous decision and thus opened up a turning phase of independent reunification making progress in the spirit of By our nation itself.
					
					 The chief declared that the AINDF would remain loyal to Kim Jong Il's behests for national reunification and conduct a dynamic struggle to successfully decorate 2017 marking the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration as a year of bringing about a new phase of independent reunification under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Warns U.S. of Massive Introduction of Nuclear Strategic Assets into S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Warns U.S. of Massive Introduction of Nuclear Strategic Assets into S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is massively introducing various types of lethal weapons including nuclear strategic assets into south Korea from the outset of the year under the absurd pretext of "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					 The U.S. plans to stage the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills with the south Korean puppet forces in coming March. To this end, it is going to deploy huge war hardware including the triad strategic weapons of its air force B-52, B-1B and B-2, and F-22s. Also, a nuclear submarine and an Aegis destroyer and aircraft carrier Carl Vinson patrolling Asia-Pacific are expected to be involved in the projected saber-rattling.
					
					 U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carriers and nuclear submarines had been involved in the war rehearsals staged so far but it is something unusual that deployment of additional strategic assets is under discussion, arousing deep concern of the international community.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the U.S. seeks to round off the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and the latest stealth destroyer Zumwalt in the waters off the Korean peninsula within this year.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. threat of aggression to violate the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK is imminent.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is increasing the tension on the Korean peninsula through its aggressive moves to carry out "pro-active deterrence strategy" and "strategy of massive retaliatory punishment", hyping "threat from the north" and "unpredictable provocation."
					
					 There is no reason for the DPRK to be exposed to the U.S. nuclear war threat and blackmail.
					
					 The U.S. is running wild to inflict a nuclear disaster upon the Korean people, not content with its unprecedented moves to isolate the DPRK politically, blockade its economy and pressurize it by force of arms for the mere reason that its ideology and social system are different from the former's and it has not yielded to the former.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered its capabilities for self-defence with a death-defying will and determination to put a definite end to the ceaseless nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. and has emerged a full-fledged nuclear power.
					
					 It has striven hard to defend its sovereignty and dignity and preserve regional peace and stability by its own efforts from the hostile forces' nuclear threat and war moves. There is no reason for anyone to doubt it.
					
					 The DPRK's strategic position has changed. The U.S. had better think twice about unimaginably catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its nuclear threat and blackmail at the doorstep of the DPRK.
					
					 The best way for Washington to escape the nuclear strike of the DPRK is to refrain from violating its dignity and security and behave itself with self-control.

articles.title: 15th All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
15th All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 15th all-people action was launched across south Korea on Feb. 11 under the sponsorship of the emergency people's action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime, according to local media reports.
					 More than 806 000 people from all walks of life took to the streets.
					
					 In Seoul, lawmakers from opposition parties and citizens held a rally at Kwanghwamun Plaza, urging the prompt resignation of Park Geun Hye and Hwang Kyo An.
					
					 At least 750 000 Seoul citizens staged a candlelight rally at the plaza. At the rally the emergency people's action declared an emergency situation for greeting spring without Park in February and called upon the people across south Korea to gather at Kwanghwamun Plaza on February 25.
					
					 At the end of the candlelight rally its participants conducted demonstration march twice.
					
					 At least 15 600 riot policemen belonging to 196 companies were mobilized to dampen the rally. 
					
					 The demonstrators marched toward Chongwadae, shouting slogans demanding immediate resignation of Park Geun Hye and Hwang Kyo An.
					
					 Similar rallies took place in Pusan, Kwangju, Taejon, Jeju Island, Chunchon, Kangrung, Wonju, Taegu, Ulsan, Sejong and other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: Resumption of Operations in KIP Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resumption of Operations in KIP Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration reportedly issued a statement on Feb. 10 on the lapse of one year since the Park Geun Hye group shut down the Kaesong Industrial Park.
					 Noting that the Park group unilaterally shut down the KIP without any agreement, the statement branded it as an illegal and unreasonable "exercise of authority without any justification and procedural validity".
					
					 It stressed that the operation of the KIP is a legitimate project guaranteed by a law in 2004 and one which the north and the south agreed not to shut down under any circumstances.
					
					 It urged the authorities to honestly respond to the people's will and immediately resume the dialogue between the north and the south and cooperation undertakings such as the KIP.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Accused of Shutting down KIP
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Accused of Shutting down KIP
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an editorial denouncing the puppet regime for having blocked the resumption of the operations in the Kaesong Industrial Park after linking it with the "nuclear issue."
					 Terming the Park Geun Hye regime's decision to shut down the KIP the worst of its failed "north policies", the editorial said:
					
					 The regime's unilateral decision went against the south-north agreement as it failed to go through necessary procedures of consultation. 
					
					 The regime asserted that funds from the KIP were "diverted by the north for the development of nukes and missiles" but it failed to produce any evidence proving it.
					
					 The reason why the regime made such a decision is not clear and it was linked with the Park's scandals disclosed here and there.

articles.title: Koreans in China Hit at S. Korean Unification Minister's Confrontation Hysteria
articles.content:
Koreans in China Hit at S. Korean Unification Minister's Confrontation Hysteria
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Feb. 9, accusing Hong Yong Phyo, puppet unification minister of south Korea, of inciting confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Hong absurdly took issue with the DPRK and cried out for realizing the "denuclearization of the north" through cooperation with the international community and "leading it to changes", touting "settlement" of the issue of divided families and relatives from the north and the south, when he appeared at a gathering of "homesick people" held at the Rimjin Pavilion some days ago, the statement charged, adding: 
					
					 Earlier, he zealously shielded traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north at a plenary meeting of the policy advisory committee of the ministry and called for "unification of social systems", spouting rubbish that it is difficult to settle the issue of denuclearization without any change of the north and the issue of denuclearization of the north should be viewed as the issue of reunification.
					
					 What he uttered is unpardonable blasphemy against the nation and reunification that poured cold water on the desire of all Koreans wanting to improve the north-south relations and pave a broad avenue to independent reunification by holding a pan-national gathering for reunification at any cost.
					
					 Hong had better prepare himself to stand trial of history, clearly mindful that his foolhardy confrontation hysteria would only precipitate his own destruction.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China held a ceremony of adopting a congratulatory message to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Sunday, with the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il approaching.
					 Present at the ceremony were the chairperson of the regional association and Koreans in China.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on February 7.
					 Alexandr Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize round-table talks, film show and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Italy
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Milano on February 4.
					 The chief of the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce through internet homepage the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il and hold a celebration meeting, seminar, reading session and other political and cultural events on the occasion of his 75th birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in China, Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in China, Nepal
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting and a film show took place in China on February 4 and a joint seminar, a photo and book exhibition and a film show in Nepal on Feb. 8 to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the army and people of the DPRK in the efforts to open the great heyday of building a socialist power.
					
					 "Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea", "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 Attending the events were officials of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, families of Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers and their children, and personages of Nepali political parties, organizations, press organs and Juche idea study organizations, including the Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee and the Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, and masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th WPK Congress Introduced in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th WPK Congress Introduced in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The DIPAGRAP Publishing House of Ecuador brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's report to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the work of the Central Committee on February 1 with the approach of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba del cohete tipo Pukguksong-2
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba del cohete tipo Pukguksong-2
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar exitosamente el dia 12 el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance del tipo Pukguksong-2, nuevo sistema de arma estrategica al estilo coreano. 
					Lo dirigio en el terreno el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					El asigno la tarea de desarrollar un cohete balistico tierra-tierra dandole el alcance alargado al SLBM cuyo disparo de ensayo resulto un exito en agosto del ano pasado. 
					
					Tras recibir el informe sobre el desarrollo del nuevo cohete, escogio personalmente el dia de su lanzamiento y dirigio en el terreno los preparativos. 
					
					En el dia de disparo, el Comandante Supremo vio primero el camion de oruga con plataforma de lanzamiento autopropulsada de cohetes balisticos, fabricado por los obreros de la industria belica con la fuerza, tecnologia e inteligencia propias. 
					
					Desde el puesto de vigilancia, se cercioro del plan correspondiente y dio la orden de realizar el lanzamiento. 
					
					En esta ocasion, se han comprobado la confiabilidad y la estabilidad del sistema de lanzamiento en frio en el terreno y las especificaciones de arranque del motor de alta potencia de combustible solido. Y fueron confirmadas las caracteristicas de induccion y control del cohete balistico durante el vuelo con motor encendido y las especificaciones de funcionamiento de los motores de alta potencia de combustible solido y las de separacion de etapas. 
					
					Ademas, han sido verificadas las caracteristicas de control de la posicion e induccion de la mejorada cabeza de combate capaz de cargar ojiva nuclear en el tramo medio y de reirrupcion despues de su separacion y las de movimiento para burlar la interceptacion.
					
					Igualmente, quedaron determinados los indices tecnicos de traslado y funcionamiento del nuevo camion con plataforma de lanzamiento, los cuales habian sido probados en las peores circunstancias simuladas de la superficie terrestre. 
					
					Tomando en consideracion la seguridad de los paises perifericos, el lanzamiento de prueba se realizo a manera de aumentar la altura en vez de alcance. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo que el nuevo cohete del tipo Pukguksong-2 es el ventajoso sistema de arma al estilo coreano que puede emplearse comodamente en la operacion y garantizar la rapidez del ataque. Lo evaluo de armamento Juche desarrollado totalmente con la inteligencia, fuerza y tecnologia domesticas desde el diseno y fabricacion del camion con plataforma de lanzamiento y el cohete y el lanzamiento de este. Se mostro muy complacido por el nacimiento de otro potente medio de ataque nuclear que hace mas poderosa a la patria. 
					
					Recalco que la industria coheteril del pais ha logrado la transicion del motor de combustible liquido al otro de combustible solido de alta potencia y del tipo de copia de modelos al de desarrollo y creacion. 
					
					Gracias al desarrollo de nuevo sistema de arma estrategica, el EPC puede cumplir con mayor exactitud y rapidez su mision estrategica en cualesquier espacios del mar y la tierra, apunto. 
					
					Terminado el disparo experimental, el Comandante Supremo se retrato junto con los cientificos y tecnicos de la industria de defensa nacional y los militares que tomaron parte en el evento.

articles.title: CPME rechaza intento del Sur de Corea de librar simulacros conjuntos con EE.UU.
articles.content:
CPME rechaza intento del Sur de Corea de librar simulacros conjuntos con EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los titeres surcoreanos intentan librar en marzo que viene junto con Estados Unidos los simulacros conjuntos de mayor envergadura Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, el portavoz del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes (CPME) contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion que senala:
					Los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de este ano en que se incorporaran enormes fuerzas armadas incluso todos los medios de ataque nuclear de las tropas norteamericanas, se desarrollaran segun los guiones de ataque preventivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, entre otros, el plan de "operacion de descabezamiento" y el "OPLAN 4D" que implica la "deteccion", la "defensa", la "perturbacion" y la "destruccion" de las bases nucleares y de misil de la RPDC, revela la nota y lo califica de expresion abierta del intento de provocar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					El alboroto de guerra anti-Norte de la banda titere surcoreana y la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC devienen un intolerable desafio a la aspiracion y demanda de la nacion coreana a la paz y reunificacion de la patria y una abierta violacion de la dignidad y soberania del pais socialista, enfatiza y continua:
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana ya pasaron el limite la hostilidad, el antagonismo, la desconfianza y el enfrentamiento y puede extender un minimo choque casual al incidente imprevisible. 
					
					A medida que los titeres surcoreanos planean y practican junto con EE.UU. los alborotos de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos tomaran las contramedidas intransigentes.
					
					Los agresores y provocadores deben actuar con prudencia reflexionando sobre la consecuencia de sus imprudentes y graves maniobras belicas anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Funcionario del Comite Olimpico condena la sancion sobre la rama de deportes
articles.content:
Funcionario del Comite Olimpico condena la sancion sobre la rama de deportes
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El subsecretario general del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kang Ryong Gil, concedio el dia 13 una entrevista con los reporteros de las oficinas de AFP y APTN en Pyongyang y de la ACNC en relacion con las sanciones impuestas al sector de deportes de la RPDC.
					  Kang dijo como sigue:
					
					  El deporte tiene gran significado en mejorar la fuerza fisica y espiritual del hombre y en promover el entendimiento, la amistad y la cooperacion entre las personas.
					
					  Por esta razon, todos los paises, naciones y pueblos de la Tierra, que consideran el deporte como lo noble y sagrado, se muestran siempre interesados en el y realizan todos los esfuerzos posibles por su desarrollo.
					
					  Es la politica del gobierno de la RPDC y la aspiracion de nuestro pueblo construir una potencia deportiva y civilizada al fomentar la fuerza fisica del pueblo y desarrollar el deporte nacional.
					
					  Pero, lamentablemente, ahora se cometen abiertamente en escala global los actos hostiles que frenan la politica del gobierno de la RPDC y socavan la aspiracion del pueblo a desarrollar el deporte.
					
					  Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles fabricaron 6 ilegales "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU desde 2006 so pretexto del problema nuclear para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					Para colmo, en marzo de 2016, aprobaron por la fuerza la "resolucion" no.2270 y al adicionar los articulos de lujo en los renglones de sancion, incluyeron absurdamente hasta los equipos de deportes masivos.
					
					Algunos paises publicaron, bajo el pretexto de implementar la "resolucion de sancion", las decisiones o las regulaciones que definen los articulos de embargo a la RPDC e imponen la prohibicion de exportacion a ella de los equipos tales como el yate, la bota de alpinismo, la moto de nieve, la apisonadora de nieve y hasta la mesa de billar y otros equipos deportivos y recreativos.
					
					Por otra parte, EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles ponen obstaculos para bloquear la transferencia bancaria con el objetivo de impedir la asistencia de fondos que brindan el COI y las federaciones de deportes para el desarrollo del movimiento olimpico y las disciplinas en los paises miembros.
					
					Alli esta ocultado el siniestro objetivo politico de bloquear el intercambio deportivo entre la RPDC y otros paises, limitar gradualmente su participacion en los Juegos Olimpicos y otras competencias internacionales, ponerla fuera del mundo moderno civilizado y buscar a la larga el cambio de su regimen.
					
					Lo condenamos fuertemente calificandolo de acto sucio e ilegal que contraviene al ideal olimpico de construir un mundo mejor y pacifico a traves del deporte, que promueve el desarrollo fisico y espiritual del hombre, y a la Carta de la ONU que estipula asegurar los derechos a la soberania, la igualdad y el desarrollo del Estado independiente.
					
					Involucrados a ciegas en el siniestro intento de politizar el deporte, algunos paises europeos y sus empresas de equipos deportivos se abstienen de vender o transportar a la RPDC los equipos deportivos incluyendo el esqui, el yate, el rifle deportivo, las municiones, el arco y la flecha, lo cual significa manchar su honra por si mismos.
					
					Los rifles deportivos no pueden convertirse nunca en los cohetes ni estos pueden ser lanzados por aquellos.
					
					A traves de la situacion anormal que acontece a nuestra vista, el mundo debe conocer claramente que la sancion no es mas que un acto cruel e incivilizado contra la humanidad y la civilizacion y hace al mundo entero volver a la era oscura medieval.
					
					Ningun argumento puede justificar la logica de bandido de que un pais considerado como hostil por EE.UU. debe abandonar su derecho al desarrollo de deportes, y la historia mundial de deportes ajustara sin falta las cuentas de ello.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
Samjiyon, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu el acto de juramento para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea enalteciendo generacion tras generacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Participaron en la ocasion el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicepresidente del PTC O Su Yong, el ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo Choe Pu Il y el vicepremier y presidente del Comite de Planificacion Estatal Ro Tu Chol, quienes son los miembros del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los miembros de mando e integrantes de la Division de Construccion 216 y los funcionarios y ameritados de la provincia de Ryanggang y del distrito de Samjiyon. 
					
					Pronunciaron discursos de juramento el vicepresidente del CC del PTC, O Su Yong, el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam.
					
					Los oradores recordaron que durante mas de medio siglo, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il condujo a la unica senda de victorias al PTC y la revolucion coreana realizando imborrables hazanas ante la patria y la historia. 
					
					Expresaron las decisiones de confiar absolutamente en el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y defenderle en lo ideo-politico y a riesgo de la vida, aunque caigan en las circunstancias mas adversas, y establecer con mas firmeza en todo el Partido y toda la sociedad el sistema de direccion unica de el. 
					
					Enfatizaron que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas enalteceran siempre al Dirigente como eterno Sol del Juche y del Songun y glorificaran generacion tras generacion sus hazanas realizadas por la construccion del ejercito. 
					
					Juraron hacer brillar la idea y proezas de direccion sobre el movimiento juvenil del Dirigente quien formo a la juventud coreana como fidedigna reserva politica del Partido y tropa especial del Comandante Supremo. 
					
					Acto seguido, se tiraron al cielo de la tierra sagrada de la revolucion los fuegos artificiales.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador irani
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador irani
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio el dia 13 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Islamica de Iran en Corea, Seyed Mohsen Emadi, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Firmados protocolos entre los gobiernos de la RPDC y Cuba
articles.content:
Firmados protocolos entre los gobiernos de la RPDC y Cuba
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedaron rubricados el dia 13 en esta capital el protocolo de la reunion para el desarrollo de la colaboracion economica y cientifico-tecnica para 2017 y el otro sobre el intercambio de mercancias para 2017 entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Cuba.

articles.title: Instituto del MINREX recuenta hazanas de Kim Jong Il por la paz y seguridad
articles.content:
Instituto del MINREX recuenta hazanas de Kim Jong Il por la paz y seguridad
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publico el dia 12 un informe memorial para transmitir las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas por la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y del mundo. 
					El reporte se refiere a que el gran Lider previno la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y prosigue:
					
					Asumiendo la noble mision de defender el destino del pais y la nacion y la paz y seguridad del mundo, el mantuvo firmemente la linea revolucionaria del Songun y practico generalmente la politica de igual nombre. 
					
					Gracias a la guia entusiasta de el decidido a consolidar, al precio que sea necesario, la capacidad de defensa nacional, la industria belica de la RPDC se hizo la mas poderosa para la autodefensa. 
					
					El inagotable poderio de defensa nacional, preparado en virtud de la politica de Songun, devino la garantia para defender firmemente la seguridad de la patria y el baluarte del socialismo frustrando las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas. 
					
					Apoyandose en las poderosas fuerzas armadas preparadas por el Dirigente, la RPDC frustro paso a paso la creciente presion militar y la campana agresiva de EE.UU. y sus seguidores. 
					
					En 1993 cuando se ha creado en la Peninsula Coreana el peligro de guerra nuclear debido a los imprudentes entrenamientos belicos de EE.UU., el gran Lider frustro el intento agresivo del imperio con las rotundas medidas de declarar el estado de preguerra y retirarse del Tratado de No Proliferacion.
					
					En abril de 1996, el ejercito coreano pacifico con resueltas acciones fisicas los movimientos aventureros de los belicistas norteamericanos y del circulo militar surcoreano que agravaban al extremo la situacion violando flagrantemente el Acuerdo de Armisticio e introduciendo armas pesadas en la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar. 
					
					A finales de 1998 cuando el imperio dio a la publicidad el "OPLAN 5027", plan de ataque preventivo anti-RPDC, esta publico la declaracion de que los atacantes a ella no podran liberarse jamas del alcance de golpe dondequiera que se encuentren, y demostro su capacidad militar real. 
					
					Kim Jong Il tomo la decision estrategica de responder a las armas nucleares con las mismas. 
					
					Segun ella, el 10 de enero de 2003, el gobierno de la RPDC se retiro totalmente del TNP al poner en vigencia su decision de retirada que se mantenia suspendida durante 10 anos.  En octubre de 2006, 3 anos despues de la retirada, la RPDC ejecuto la primera prueba nuclear subterranea y la segunda en mayo de 2009.
					
					Por el efecto disuasorio de la posesion de arma nuclear por la RPDC, se ha reducido considerablemente el peligro de estallido de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Se han defendido con mas firmeza la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo gracias al Dirigente quien dio al traste con las tentativas de provocacion de guerra de EE.UU. consolidando por todos los medios el poderio militar autodefensivo centrado en el disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					El dirigio sabiamente a que el gobierno de la RPDC presentara las propuestas justas y realistas para garantizar la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana y la region y realizara esfuerzos constantes por cumplirlas. 
					
					Entre esas iniciativas figuran la de concertar el convenio de paz entre la RPDC y EE.UU. hecha en marzo de 1974, la de establecer nuevo sistema que pueda prevenir la reproduccion de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y garantizar la paz duradera formulada en abril de 1994 y la otra mas detallada presentada en febrero de 1996 que exige la firma del convenio provisional RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					El 4 de agosto de 1997, Kim Jong Il expuso la posicion de principios de realizar la reunificacion del pais no por via militar sino de manera pacifica. Destaco que para ese fin, EE.UU. debe renunciar su politica hostil anti-RPDC y establecer el nuevo sistema de aseguramiento de paz en la Peninsula Coreana al pactar el convenio de paz entre ambas partes. 
					
					Durante la visita del enviado especial del Dirigente a Estados Unidos realizada en octubre de 2000, se publico el comunicado conjunto en que ambas partes coincidieron en que hay varios remedios para dar punto final a la guerra coreana al relajar la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y convertir el Acuerdo de Armisticio en el sistema de paz duradera. 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC tomo parte activa en las conversaciones multilaterales como las de 4 y 6 bandas para la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana asumiendo actitud sincera en los debates. 
					
					De acuerdo con la magna idea del Dirigente en materia de reunificacion de la patria y su proyecto de aseguramiento de paz, se dinamizaron los viajes, contactos y cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas y se aprobo la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en la cumbre intercoreana de 2000. 
					
					Asi, se ha preparado el gran programa comun de la nacion para la reunificacion con que pueda asegurar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y realizar la reintegracion territorial con las fuerzas de los connacionales. 
					
					Posteriormente, se adopto y se ejecuto entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea el acuerdo de evitar el choque accidental en el Mar Oeste, parar la propaganda tendenciosa en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar y eliminar sus medios y tomo auge la cooperacion en diferentes sectores tales como la politica, la economia y la cultura. 
					
					En la historica cumbre N-S celebrada en 2007, quedo aprobada la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre en que ambas partes llegaron al consenso de establecer el sistema de paz duradera acabando con el actual de armisticio y cooperar en impulsar el problema de declarar el fin de guerra a traves de la reunion en la Peninsula Coreana de los jefes de Estado de 3 o 4 partes directamente interesadas.
					
					Tales proezas imperecederas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il brillan mas hoy en dia gracias a la extraordinaria orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Hoy dia, cuando se consolida mas el inagotable poderio estatal de la RPDC y se presentan como impostergable demanda de la epoca el mejoramiento de vinculos intercoreanos y la reunificacion de Corea, EE.UU. y los paises vecinos deben respetar la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y su voluntad de reunificacion independiente y ajustar conforme a estas la politica. He aqui el remedio realista por lograr la paz y seguridad duraderas de la Peninsula Coreana y la region. 
					
					Gracias a las inmortales hazanas de Kim Jong Il y a la sabia orientacion de Kim Jong Un quien defiende fidedignamente la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y del mundo entero, la RPDC preservara tambien en el futuro con fuerza propia la paz y seguridad del Estado y hara gran aporte a defender la paz y estabilidad del planeta.

articles.title: CRN publica acta de acusacion revelando crimenes de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRN publica acta de acusacion revelando crimenes de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica la vispera una nota de acusacion para registrar en la historia nacional las lecciones de que la traidora Park Geun-hye, poseedora de "nuevo record criminal" incomparable con los pasados gobernadores surcoreanos, se ha convertido en la "momia viva" luego de ser rechazada por la nacion y fue sentenciada severamente por la opinion publica. 
					La traidora Park propuso unas invenciones toscas e insignificantes tales como "proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana", la "Declaracion de Dresden" y "Thong-il Taebak (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion)", insultando la aspiracion de la nacion coreana a la reunificacion, recuerda el documento. 
					
					No vale la pena de discutir la "politica de unificacion" de Park, insiste y burla a ella como Don Quijote de siglo XXI. 
					
					En el pasado hubo algunos que con el veto a la misma nacion y el pavor a la superioridad del regimen socialista de la RPDC, mas ventajoso del mundo, chismeaban las porquerias en los escondrijos en vez de los lugares oficiales, adelanta y continua: 
					
					Sin embargo, solamente la traidora Park no vacilo en cometer las pilladas exponiendo mas brutalmente su imprudencia. 
					
					Empeoro al maximo la confrontacion intercoreana mediante el lanzamiento de volantes con contenidos anti-RPDC y se entrego a la difamacion a su connacional con la reanudacion de la radiodifusion psicologica e intrigante. E incluso, trazo los guiones incluyendo la "operacion de avance a Pyongyang" y el "plan de gobernacion despues de la conquista de Pyongyang" e intentaba desarrollar atrevidamente la "operacion de descabezamiento".
					
					Y puesta con el uniforme militar titere, la traidora aparecio en los puestos de frente avanzado donde abogo por la agresion al Norte. 
					
					Acabo con la operacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
